class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)      
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        dv = 1
        dh = 1
        pv = 0
        ph = 0
        cost = 0
        while (pv < len(verticalCut) and ph < len(horizontalCut)):
            if verticalCut[pv] >= horizontalCut[ph]:
                cost += verticalCut[pv] * (dv)
                dh += 1
                pv += 1
            else:
                cost += horizontalCut[ph] * dh
                dv += 1
                ph += 1
        cost += sum(verticalCut[pv:]) * dv + sum(horizontalCut[ph:]) * dh
        return cost
